00001 #include <math.h>
00002 #include "Lgm/Lgm_Vec.h"

00004 /*
00005  * Create an Lgm_Vector
00006  */
00007 Lgm_Vector *Lgm_CreateVector( double x, double y, double z ){
00008     Lgm_Vector *v;
00009     v = (Lgm_Vector *) calloc( 1, sizeof(*v) );
00010     v->x = x;
00011     v->y = y;
00012     v->z = z;
00013     return( v );
00014 }
00015 
00016 
00017 /*
00018  * Given vectors a and b, compute the cross product, c.
00019  */
00020 void Lgm_CrossProduct(Lgm_Vector *a, Lgm_Vector *b, Lgm_Vector *c) {
00021 
00022     c->x = (a->y * b->z) - (a->z * b->y);
00023     c->y = (a->z * b->x) - (a->x * b->z);
00024     c->z = (a->x * b->y) - (a->y * b->x);
00025 }
00026 
00027 
00028 /*
00029  * Given vectors a and b, compute and return the dot product
00030  */
00031 double Lgm_DotProduct(Lgm_Vector *a, Lgm_Vector *b) {
00032     return(a->x * b->x + a->y * b->y + a->z * b->z);
00033 }
00034 
00035 
00036 /*
00037  * Normalize the given vector. I.e. make it into a unit vector.
00038  * plus return magnitude since you already have it! 
00039  */
00040 double Lgm_NormalizeVector(Lgm_Vector *a) {
00041     double magnitude, inv;
00042 
00043     magnitude = sqrt((a->x * a->x) + (a->y * a->y) + (a->z * a->z));
00044     if (magnitude > 0.0) {
00045         inv = 1.0/magnitude;
00046         a->x *= inv;
00047         a->y *= inv;
00048         a->z *= inv;
00049         return(magnitude);
00050     } else {
00051         return(-1.0);
00052     }
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00056 /* 
00057  * multiply the given vector by a scalar value
00058  */
00059 void Lgm_ScaleVector(Lgm_Vector *a, double value) {
00060     a->x *= value;
00061     a->y *= value;
00062     a->z *= value;
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 
00067 
00068 /* 
00069  * return the magnitude of a vector
00070  */
00071 double Lgm_Magnitude( Lgm_Vector *a) {
00072     return( sqrt((a->x * a->x) + (a->y * a->y) + (a->z * a->z)) );
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 /* 
00077  *  Subtract two vectors
00078  *  c = a-b
00079  */
00080 void Lgm_VecSub(Lgm_Vector *c, Lgm_Vector *a, Lgm_Vector *b ) {
00081     c->x = a->x - b->x;
00082     c->y = a->y - b->y;
00083     c->z = a->z - b->z;
00084 }
00085 
00086 /* 
00087  *  Add two vectors
00088  *  c = a+b
00089  */
00090 void Lgm_VecAdd(Lgm_Vector *c, Lgm_Vector *a, Lgm_Vector *b ) {
00091     c->x = a->x + b->x;
00092     c->y = a->y + b->y;
00093     c->z = a->z + b->z;
00094 }
00095 
00096 /* 
00097  *  Find Magnitude of difference between to vectors
00098  */
00099 double Lgm_VecDiffMag(Lgm_Vector *a, Lgm_Vector *b ) {
00100     Lgm_Vector c;
00101     Lgm_VecSub( &c, a, b ); // c = a-b
00102     return( Lgm_Magnitude( &c ) );
00103 }
00104 
00105 /* 
00106  * makes the given vector have a magnitude of mag
00107  */
00108 void Lgm_ForceMagnitude(Lgm_Vector *a, double mag) {
00109     Lgm_NormalizeVector(a);
00110     Lgm_ScaleVector(a, mag);
00111 }
00112 
00113 
00114 /*
00115  *  Routine to compute A dot V
00116  *    double A[3][3];         -- Trans Matrix
00117  *    Lgm_Vector *V;              -- Lgm_Vector
00118  *    Lgm_Vector *Result;         -- the result of the product
00119  */
00120 void Lgm_MatTimesVec(double A[3][3], Lgm_Vector *V, Lgm_Vector *Result) {
00121     Result->x = A[0][0]*V->x + A[1][0]*V->y + A[2][0]*V->z;
00122     Result->y = A[0][1]*V->x + A[1][1]*V->y + A[2][1]*V->z;
00123     Result->z = A[0][2]*V->x + A[1][2]*V->y + A[2][2]*V->z;
00124 }
00125 
00126 /*
00127  * Return transpose of A in B
00128  */
00129 void Lgm_Transpose( double A[3][3], double B[3][3] ) {
00130 
00131     int i, j;
00132 
00133     for (i=0; i<3; i++){
00134         for (j=0; j<3; j++){
00135             B[i][j] = A[j][i];
00136         }
00137     }
00138 
00139 }
00140 
00141 
00142 /*
00143  *  Routine to compute A x B
00144  *    double A[3][3];         -- Trans Matrix
00145  *    double B[3][3];         -- Trans Matrix
00146  *    double Result[3][3];    -- Trans Matrix
00147  */
00148 void Lgm_MatTimesMat( double A[3][3], double B[3][3], double R[3][3] ) {
00149 
00150     R[0][0] = A[0][0]*B[0][0] + A[1][0]*B[0][1] + A[2][0]*B[0][2];
00151     R[0][1] = A[0][1]*B[0][0] + A[1][1]*B[0][1] + A[2][1]*B[0][2];
00152     R[0][2] = A[0][2]*B[0][0] + A[1][2]*B[0][1] + A[2][2]*B[0][2];
00153 
00154     R[1][0] = A[0][0]*B[1][0] + A[1][0]*B[1][1] + A[2][0]*B[1][2];
00155     R[1][1] = A[0][1]*B[1][0] + A[1][1]*B[1][1] + A[2][1]*B[1][2];
00156     R[1][2] = A[0][2]*B[1][0] + A[1][2]*B[1][1] + A[2][2]*B[1][2];
00157 
00158     R[2][0] = A[0][0]*B[2][0] + A[1][0]*B[2][1] + A[2][0]*B[2][2];
00159     R[2][1] = A[0][1]*B[2][0] + A[1][1]*B[2][1] + A[2][1]*B[2][2];
00160     R[2][2] = A[0][2]*B[2][0] + A[1][2]*B[2][1] + A[2][2]*B[2][2];
00161 
00162 }
